This is the FTP Server Demo version. Support development by getting the FTP Server from the android market. Click here to go to the market.
The password must consist of 1 or more alphanumeric characters. No other characters are allowed.
The password must consist of 1 or more alphanumeric characters. No other characters are allowed.
Anonymous logins are only allowed read access
The port number must be in the range 1 to 65535.

\ Thanks for using FTP Server (SwiFTP)! Here are some brief usage instructions. More information can be found at http://ppareit.github.com/swiftp/.

\ \ This program allows you to run an ftp server on your android device. This means that any program can access the files on your device while the ftp server is running. For example, entering 'ftp://...' in the firefox url bar will allow you to browse the files on your device from a desktop pc or a laptop.

 \ By default, the user name and password are both 'ftp', you should change them. You use this username and password when accessing the server.

 \ There is a configuration option ("keep phone awake") that fixes a problem where file transfers go slow or stop completely when the phone sleeps. If you have this problem, check this box and restart the program. Your phone will stay awake as long as the server is running.

 \ For power and security reasons, it is recommended that the server be stopped after use.

\ \ If something is not working the way you expect it to, please report it to Pieter Pareit (pieter.pareit@gmail.com).

\ \ The development of this open source program is supported by buying this program through the google play store. You can follow the development at https://github.com/ppareit/swiftp . To have an idea on the features that will be implemented, see the issue tracker at https://github.com/ppareit/swiftp/issues .

Demo started while paid version is installed

Thank you for supporting the development!\n\n You are trying to start the demo version while the paid version is installed. To insure optimal operation we ask you to remove the demo version and only start the paid version.
Warning: storage is not available. You may want to unmount it.
FTP Server (SwiFTP) allows you to run an ftp server on your android device.

Dave Revell, Alexander Friesen, tescott425, Peng Fei, MadMaverick9, j3l11234, Sergey Kondakov, Tianhao Wu, Lorenzo M, Naofumi Fukue, Valerio Bozzolan, Thomas Löwe, Mladen Pejaković, valentind44, Birgit Niemegeers
